comments.comment:
Ane kaalakanni minihoo umbath kaa wenuwenda me kade yanne...? Thopith salli hambawenawanam oona asuuchi godak kai. Ratata hena gahuwath kamaknaa neda paththare minihoo. Lajja weyalla mewage wada karana  saama kenekma. 
Namuthuth mahinda mahatha saha sf wiruwaanan athululu ea mahangu mehewara itukireemata daayakawuu saamadenaatama labiya yuthu uthum hada piri pranaamaya labiya yuthumai. Eke dekak naa. Namuth  Ihatha ethumaa kiyaa aamanthranaya kalath dannam mage saha rate bohoo denaage ehema aakalpayak naa. Mokada pasuwa kala bohoodewal duushitha kriyaawanne saha me athiwuu wiyasanaya kalin danagenath eeta nisi kriyaamaarga gaththeth naane wipaksha nayakayaya washayenwath. Ohth tharaye danagatha yuthui thamaa wipaksha naayakayaa waga. Thopita one malamini udin gos hoo thama awalan aramunu ishta siddha kara gannai. Oya wage thirisan wadakarana thopi serama paare panuwo gahala marenna one aniwaaryenma.  Kesehoo prashnaya thiyenne  onatharam kee wijaygrahanaya aabaranayak karagena ea thulin thama thamaage dewal karagaththu ekane. Ekane thama putuwa deela yanna une. Kese hoo dan inna kaalakanni hathath eeta nodeweni lesa me rata kaabaasinaa karamin yanawa. Ithin kiyanna thiyenne thaea duratath me rate janathaawa andanna epaa kiyalai. Dannam hithanawa rate inna bohoo pirisak kalakanni deshapaluwanwa therumgena athai kiyaa. Penawane pissu,  mongal mythriyath karana thakatheeru amana,  gon wad. Waradilaa hoo  thawaduratath eunwa therum nogena katayuthu kaloth me rate jaathiye maranayai. Penawane me rajayath jaathiwaadee,  deshadroohee muslimaanuwata salakana hati saha apata salakana hati. Apith me rate wahallu wegana yanne.
comments.author: Prashan Silva
